1256090.name: Shadowforge Pro
1256090.description:
THIS IS NO LONGER A DLC FOR SHADOWFORGE. EVERYTHING HERE IS IN THE BASE SOFTWARE NOW.

Shadowforge Pro is the full version of Shadowforge and has new features available to use for users that want to use it to the next level.

Shadowforge Pro includes:

Choose your own size on your canvas instead of the pre defined canvas sizes

Play with Color Up/Down, Saturation Up/Down, Value Up/Down, Alpha Up/Down and Shadows Up/Down (must hide the palette with button "G").

Rotate the camera with buttons "H" and "V".

Record and save your animations with button "Y".
